message.content:
A langur is a type of monkey found in Asia.
It has long limbs and a slender body, with a distinctive black face and ears.
The fur of a langur can be black, gray, or brown, and is often silky in texture.
They have a long tail which can be as long as or even longer than their body.
Langurs are social animals and can typically be found in groups or troops.
These monkeys primarily feed on leaves, fruits, and flowers.
Due to habitat loss and hunting, some species of langurs are currently endangered.
